provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Appropriation Act, 2014.         Shontitle.
2                 [No.   ]         The Approp,.iation Act, 2014
Expenditure          2. The Accountant-General may, on the warrant of the Minister,
Authorized.       issue out of the Consolidated Fun~ a sum not exceeding in the
                  aggregate, Two Hundred and Eighty Seven Thousand, Four Hundred
                  and Ninety Six Million, Nine Hundred and Seventy Five Thousand
                  Dollars for defraying the several charges and expenses of the
                  Government of Jamaica, and for other purposes, for the financial
                  year ending on the 31st day of March, 2015.
Appropriations.      3.--{I) The sum granted by section 2 is hereby appropriated
Schedule.         for the services and purposes specified in the Schedule, pursuant
                  to and in accordance with, subsection (1) of section 116 of the
                  Constitution of Jamaica, and shall be deemed to have been so
                  appropriated from the 1st day of April. 2014.
                          (2) In addition to the said sum granted out ofthe Consolidated
                  Fund, accounting officers may apply out of any money, whether
                  received by way of fee, penalty. proceeds of sale, or by way of
                  extra or unusual receipt, as appropriations-in-aid of the services
                  and purposes specified in the Schedule, the sums respectively set
                  out in the last column ofthe Schedule.
